text: my name is devang Sharma and I'm working
as a technical sourcing recruiter
the most exciting part of my job is to
engage with loads of candidates I speak
to so many candidates every day and to
understand what they're looking for how
they're actually excited to be a part of
AWS they want to actually contribute and
make a change we are innovating every
day we are growing every day I love
working with my team and I've been
really supportive and we work in a
collaborative Manner and we communicate
a lot and not just about work but also
just share personal stories personal
achievements and we celebrate each
other's success so I believe my team is
amazing
diversity is really important and when I
talk about diversity and I talk about
gender diversity I talk about culture
diversity people coming from different
backgrounds because I believe they have
different thought process different
mindsets different approach to uh to the
problems we solve every day and it's
really important for organization like
AWS as we're growing so fast so if you
have more ideas more Innovative
approaches it's something that benefits
us and in turn the community
I moved to Dublin three years ago for my
studies and I have never turned back and
it's a beautiful city amazing Vibe I
love this city to be honest if you're
looking to grow if you're looking to
test and challenge yourself AWS is the
place for you
